name: Jessica Alvarez
feedback: I joined OTU after struggling with options for months. The mentorship here gave me clarity and structure. I went from random trades to disciplined setups.

name: Michael Chen
feedback: The modules are practical and easy to follow. I especially liked how each lesson connects to real trade examples. The Discord community is also a big plus.

name: David Thompson
feedback: Before OTU I had blown two small accounts. With the strategies I learned here, I finally managed to stay consistent and protect my capital.

name: Sarah Patel
feedback: What makes OTU different is the accountability. You are not just watching videos, you are interacting with mentors and other traders daily.

name: Brandon Lewis
feedback: The live profit feed gave me confidence that these strategies are actually applied in real time, not just theory. Highly recommend to anyone serious.

name: Emily Davis
feedback: I joined as a complete beginner. The glossary and modules explained everything step by step. I finally understood Greeks and risk management.

name: Anthony Wilson
feedback: Mentorship calls alone are worth the fee. It's rare to find educators who actually trade and show receipts. OTU does exactly that.

name: Rachel Morgan
feedback: I’ve been trading stocks for 3 years but avoided options because they seemed complex. OTU simplified it and now options are a key part of my strategy.

name: Daniel Carter
feedback: Transparent, supportive, and realistic. They don’t promise Lambos overnight. They teach you to manage risk and build long-term consistency.

name: Sophia Martinez
feedback: I work full-time so I needed a flexible program. OTU’s lessons and recorded sessions fit into my schedule perfectly.

name: Joshua Brooks
feedback: At first I thought this was just another trading course, but the mentorship made all the difference. Real strategies, real results.

name: Hannah White
feedback: I finally understand how to set up spreads and manage risk thanks to the simple breakdowns in the modules.

name: Kevin Johnson
feedback: The profit snapshots motivated me to stay disciplined and not chase unrealistic gains. Slow and steady works.

name: Maria Lopez
feedback: The glossary section was surprisingly useful. It cleared up so many confusing terms that I saw online.

name: Christopher Green
feedback: What I liked most is how real the community feels. People share both wins and mistakes, which is valuable.

name: Olivia Baker
feedback: I’ve tried YouTube and free courses but OTU put everything together in a structured way that actually made sense.

name: Matthew Evans
feedback: The watchlist tool is a game changer. I can follow along with the same stocks as the mentors.

name: Chloe Richardson
feedback: The lifestyle gallery isn’t just about flexing—it shows what’s possible if you put in the work.

name: William Foster
feedback: My first month I just studied the modules and asked questions in DM. In month two I placed my first profitable spread.

name: Grace Phillips
feedback: The team is approachable. I was nervous to DM but they actually responded and helped me.
